Name: Pixel Puzzles Mosaics
About the game: Pixel Puzzles Mosaics is a nontraditional puzzle game. Piece together a range of 34 Mosaics by rearranging the jumbled tiles in order to complete the puzzle. Features: Nontraditional puzzle gameplay. Relaxing atmosphere. 34 Steam Achievements. 34 Mosaics in a range of sizes. Beautiful photos. Interactive play environment.
